channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Trump names former Texas state Rep. Scott Turner to lead Housing and Urban Development
item.description: HUD is bracing for possible budget cuts, something the first Trump administration proposed but was unable to get through Congress. Other changes could restrict who gets rental aid.
item.content:encoded:
HUD is bracing for possible budget cuts, something the first Trump administration proposed but was unable to get through Congress. Other changes could restrict who gets rental aid.

(Image credit: Alastair Pike)
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Ludden

item.title: Trump picks Oregon Congresswoman Lori Chavez-DeRemer to lead Labor Department
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Congresswoman Lori Chavez-DeRemer of Oregon to lead the Labor Department. She was one of a few Republicans who support the pro-union PRO Act.
item.content:encoded:
President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Congresswoman Lori Chavez-DeRemer of Oregon to lead the Labor Department. She was one of a few Republicans who support the pro-union PRO Act.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hsu

item.title: Trump nominates Russ Vought for White House budget director once again
item.description: Vought was one of the architects of the conservative agenda known as Project 2025 and served as budget director during President-elect Donald Trump's first term in office.
item.content:encoded:
Vought was one of the architects of the conservative agenda known as Project 2025 and served as budget director during President-elect Donald Trump's first term in office.

(Image credit: Samuel Corum)
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram

item.title: Trump nominates Wall Street investor Scott Bessent as treasury secretary
item.description: President-elect Trump nominated Bessent, a former protégé of George Soros to be his next treasury secretary.
item.content:encoded:
President-elect Trump nominated Bessent, a former protégé of George Soros to be his next treasury secretary.

(Image credit: DOMINIC GWINN)
item.dc:creator: Maria Aspan

item.title: For the first time ever, Taliban reps were invited to the big U.N. climate conference
item.description: Since the Taliban took power 2021, Afghanistan has not been invited to big climate conferences. And money for projects addressing climate-related issues has been frozen. Are things about to change?
item.content:encoded:
Since the Taliban took power 2021, Afghanistan has not been invited to big climate conferences. And money for projects addressing climate-related issues has been frozen. Are things about to change?

(Image credit: Lynsey Addario/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Ruchi Kumar

item.title: A Relationship Surviving 1,000 Days of War
item.description: It has been over a thousand days since Russia began it's full-scale invasion of Ukraine. The war has had huge geopolitical ramifications, but it has also has affected the lives of millions of ordinary people. Our correspondent in Kyiv tells us how the one couple in Ukraine has weathered the conflict.
item.content:encoded:
It has been over a thousand days since Russia began it's full-scale invasion of Ukraine. The war has had huge geopolitical ramifications, but it has also has affected the lives of millions of ordinary people. Our correspondent in Kyiv tells us how the one couple in Ukraine has weathered the conflict.

(Image credit: Claire Harbage)
item.dc:creator: Joanna Kakissis

item.title: Wisconsin kayaker who faked his death has resurfaced in Europe after elaborate plot
item.description: Wisconsin authorities say they have not yet issued a warrant for Ryan Borgwardt, who is believed to be somewhere in Eastern Europe. But that can change if he does not cooperate and return home soon.
item.content:encoded:
Wisconsin authorities say they have not yet issued a warrant for Ryan Borgwardt, who is believed to be somewhere in Eastern Europe. But that can change if he does not cooperate and return home soon.

(Image credit: Green Lake County Sheriff's Office via AP)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: Jonathan Majors and ex-girlfriend Grace Jabbari settle assault and defamation case
item.description: In a civil lawsuit this spring, the actor's former girlfriend alleged a "pattern of pervasive domestic abuse" in addition to defamation. Her legal team said the suit has been settled.
item.content:encoded:
In a civil lawsuit this spring, the actor's former girlfriend alleged a "pattern of pervasive domestic abuse" in addition to defamation. Her legal team said the suit has been settled.

(Image credit: Richard Shotwell)
item.dc:creator: Clare Lombardo

item.title: University of Texas, MIT and others announce free tuition for some undergraduates
item.description: Nearly half a dozen institutions of higher education announced plans this week to make tuition free for undergraduates whose families make below a certain income threshold, starting in fall 2025.
item.content:encoded:
Nearly half a dozen institutions of higher education announced plans this week to make tuition free for undergraduates whose families make below a certain income threshold, starting in fall 2025.

(Image credit: Charles Krupa)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: Judge indefinitely postpones sentencing in Trump's hush money case
item.description: The decision to indefinitely adjourn next week's sentencing date comes several days after both lawyers agreed that a stay would help sort out unprecedented legal questions.
item.content:encoded:
The decision to indefinitely adjourn next week's sentencing date comes several days after both lawyers agreed that a stay would help sort out unprecedented legal questions.

(Image credit: Brandon Bell)
item.dc:creator: Ximena Bustillo
